comments.raw_text:
Could this have been caused by latest changes to BasePrincipal.cpp?
https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/log/ff7eec7be698cd21d92755d709e08897100fa9c8/caps/BasePrincipal.cpp

I clicked on a link, wanted to go back and got a tab crash.
This bug is for crash report bp-802217ec-37fb-4666-9f63-361730200424.

```
Top 10 frames of crashing thread:

0 libxul.so mozilla::BasePrincipal::IsThirdPartyPrincipal caps/BasePrincipal.cpp:480
1 libxul.so mozilla::ContentBlocking::AllowAccessFor toolkit/components/antitracking/ContentBlocking.cpp:324
2 libxul.so mozilla::dom::Document::MaybeAllowStorageForOpenerAfterUserInteraction dom/base/Document.cpp:15140
3 libxul.so mozilla::dom::Document::SetUserHasInteracted dom/base/Document.cpp:14980
4 libxul.so mozilla::EventStateManager::PreHandleEvent dom/events/EventStateManager.cpp:508
5 libxul.so mozilla::PresShell::EventHandler::DispatchEvent layout/base/PresShell.cpp:7919
6 libxul.so mozilla::PresShell::EventHandler::HandleEventWithCurrentEventInfo layout/base/PresShell.cpp:7888
7 libxul.so mozilla::PresShell::EventHandler::HandleEventWithTarget layout/base/PresShell.cpp:7796
8 libxul.so mozilla::PresShell::HandleEventWithTarget layout/base/PresShell.h:650
9 libxul.so mozilla::PointerEventHandler::DispatchPointerFromMouseOrTouch dom/events/PointerEventHandler.cpp:523

```

> 1 libxul.so mozilla::ContentBlocking::AllowAccessFor toolkit/components/antitracking/ContentBlocking.cpp:324

This file was changed by bug 1616775 yesterday. I'm using Fission and my build 20200423214309 is the first that has these changes.
